fullplot: A vagrant enters the lives of an arrogant upper-class family, turning their lives into a psychological nightmare in the process.
plot: A vagrant enters the lives of an arrogant upper-class family, turning their lives into a psychological nightmare in the process.
title: Borgman

tomatoes.consensus: Borgman's unpredictability may confound as many viewers as it enthralls, but either way, it's a refreshingly original experiment in off-kilter terror.
